alert.message:
Node: graph-01.tk

Blocks processing per Minute is below 0.001.

What: Block processing rate (%) is to low.

Why: Most likely Ethereum node is unhealthy.

What to do: Restart Ethereum Node
alert.name: Blocks Processed per Minute (all subgraphs) alert

targets.rawSql:
select
  d.deployment as deployment,
  d.latest_ethereum_block_number as latest_block,
  (case when d.synced then '✔' else '-' end) as synced,
  (case when a.node_id like '%node%' then  replace(a.node_id, 'index_node_','')
   else 'stopped' end) as nodeId,
  n.head_block_number as mainnet_block,
  ((n.head_block_number - d.latest_ethereum_block_number)/4)::decimal as lag,
  (n.head_block_number - d.latest_ethereum_block_number) as blocks_behind_network
from subgraphs.subgraph_deployment as d,
     subgraphs.subgraph_deployment_assignment as a,
     ethereum_networks  as n
where
d.id = a.id
and n.name = 'mainnet'

select
  d.deployment as deployment,
  d.latest_ethereum_block_number as latest_block,
  (case when d.synced then '✔' else '-' end) as synced,
  (case when a.node_id like '%node%' then  replace(a.node_id, 'index_node_','')
   else 'stopped' end) as nodeId,
  n.head_block_number as mainnet_block,
  ((n.head_block_number - d.latest_ethereum_block_number)/4)::decimal as lag,
  (n.head_block_number - d.latest_ethereum_block_number) as blocks_behind_network
from subgraphs.subgraph_deployment as d,
     subgraphs.subgraph_deployment_assignment as a,
     ethereum_networks  as n
where
d.id = a.id
and n.name = 'mainnet'
and d.failed

select
  d.deployment as deployment,
  d.latest_ethereum_block_number as latest_block,
  (case when d.synced then '✔' else '-' end) as synced,
  (case when a.node_id like '%node%' then  replace(a.node_id, 'index_node_','')
   else 'stopped' end) as nodeId,
  n.head_block_number as mainnet_block,
  ((n.head_block_number - d.latest_ethereum_block_number)/4)::decimal as lag,
  (n.head_block_number - d.latest_ethereum_block_number) as blocks_behind_network
from subgraphs.subgraph_deployment as d,
     subgraphs.subgraph_deployment_assignment as a,
     ethereum_networks  as n
where
d.id = a.id
and n.name = 'mainnet'
and not d.failed

select
  d.deployment as deployment,
  d.latest_ethereum_block_number as latest_block,
  (case when d.synced then '✔' else '-' end) as synced,
  (case when a.node_id like '%node%' then  replace(a.node_id, 'index_node_','')
   else 'stopped' end) as nodeId,
  n.head_block_number as mainnet_block,
  ((n.head_block_number - d.latest_ethereum_block_number)/4)::decimal as lag,
  (n.head_block_number - d.latest_ethereum_block_number) as blocks_behind_network
from subgraphs.subgraph_deployment as d,
     subgraphs.subgraph_deployment_assignment as a,
     ethereum_networks  as n
where
d.id = a.id
and n.name = 'mainnet'
and a.node_id = 'removed'

-- grafana ignore
select
  g.name || (case
        when g.pending_version = v.id then ' (P)'
        when g.current_version = v.id then ' (C)'
        else ' (U)' end) as subgraph_name,
  m.description as description,
  d.id as deployment,
  s.id as schema,
  (case when a.node_id like '%node%' then  replace(a.node_id, 'index_node_','')
   else 'stopped' end) as nodeId,
  sd.health as health,
  (case when sd.health = 'healthy' then 0
       when sd.health = 'failed' then 2 end) health_map,
  --sd.failed as failed,
  d.synced::text,
  n.name as network,
  (n.head_block_number - d.latest_ethereum_block_number) as blocks_behind_network,
  (case when n.name = 'mainnet' then ((n.head_block_number - d.latest_ethereum_block_number)/4)::text
        when n.name = 'rinkeby' then ((n.head_block_number - d.latest_ethereum_block_number)/4)::text
        when n.name = 'kovan' then ((n.head_block_number - d.latest_ethereum_block_number)/15)::text
        when n.name = 'poa-core' then ((n.head_block_number - d.latest_ethereum_block_number)/12)::text
        else 'ø' end) as lag
from subgraphs.subgraph_deployment as d,
     subgraphs.subgraph_deployment_assignment as a,
     subgraphs.subgraph_version as v,
     subgraphs.subgraph as g,
     subgraphs.ethereum_contract_data_source as ds,
     subgraphs.subgraph_manifest m,
     ethereum_networks  as n,
     deployment_schemas as s,
     subgraphs.subgraph_deployment_detail as sd
where g.id = v.subgraph
  and v.id in (g.pending_version, g.current_version)
  and a.id = d.id
  and m.id = d.manifest 
  and ds.id = m.data_sources[1]
  and s.subgraph = d.id
  and v.deployment = d.id
  and d.failed
  and n.name = ds.network
  and sd.manifest = m.id
  and a.node_id = 'removed'
order by blocks_behind_network desc, subgraph_name;

select
  d.deployment as deployment,
  d.latest_ethereum_block_number as latest_block,
  (case when d.synced then '✔' else '-' end) as synced,
  (case when a.node_id like '%node%' then  replace(a.node_id, 'index_node_','')
   else 'stopped' end) as nodeId,
  n.head_block_number as mainnet_block,
  ((n.head_block_number - d.latest_ethereum_block_number)/4)::decimal as lag,
  (n.head_block_number - d.latest_ethereum_block_number) as blocks_behind_network
from subgraphs.subgraph_deployment as d,
     subgraphs.subgraph_deployment_assignment as a,
     ethereum_networks  as n
where
d.id = a.id
and n.name = 'mainnet'

SELECT
d.name,
d.ipfs as deployment,
r."allocationAmount"/1000000000000000000 as allocation,
m.model as model
FROM deployment_description as d
LEFT JOIN public."IndexingRules" as r ON d.b32 = r.deployment
LEFT JOIN public."CostModels" as m ON d.b32 = m.deployment
WHERE d.b32 = r.deployment

-- grafana ignore
select
  --g.name || (case
        --when g.pending_version = v.id then ' (P)'
        --when g.current_version = v.id then ' (C)'
        --else ' (U)' end) as subgraph_name,
 --m.description as description,
  sd.entity_count as entity_count,
  d.id as deployment,
  --s.id as schema,
  (case when a.node_id like '%node%' then  replace(a.node_id, 'index_node_','')
   else 'stopped' end) as nodeId,
  sd.health as health,
  --(case when sd.health = 'healthy' then 0
   --    when sd.health = 'failed' then 2 end) health_map,
  --sd.failed as failed,
  --d.synced::text,
  (case when d.synced then '✔' else '-' end) as synced,
  n.name as network,
  d.latest_ethereum_block_number as latest_block,
  (n.head_block_number - d.latest_ethereum_block_number) as blocks_behind_network,
  (case when n.name = 'mainnet' then ((n.head_block_number - d.latest_ethereum_block_number)/4)::decimal
        when n.name = 'rinkeby' then ((n.head_block_number - d.latest_ethereum_block_number)/4)::decimal
        when n.name = 'kovan' then ((n.head_block_number - d.latest_ethereum_block_number)/15)::decimal
        when n.name = 'poa-core' then ((n.head_block_number - d.latest_ethereum_block_number)/12)::decimal --text
        else 0 end) as lag --'ø'
from subgraphs.subgraph_deployment as d,
     subgraphs.subgraph_deployment_assignment as a,
     subgraphs.subgraph_version as v,
     subgraphs.subgraph as g,
     subgraphs.ethereum_contract_data_source as ds,
     subgraphs.subgraph_manifest m,
     ethereum_networks  as n,
     deployment_schemas as s,
     subgraphs.subgraph_deployment_detail as sd
where g.id = v.subgraph
  and v.id in (g.pending_version, g.current_version)
  and a.id = d.id
  and m.id = d.manifest 
  and ds.id = m.data_sources[1]
  and s.subgraph = d.id
  and v.deployment = d.id
  --and not d.failed
  and n.name = ds.network
  and sd.manifest = m.id
order by blocks_behind_network desc, subgraph_name;

SELECT
  vid, block_hash, subgraph_id, message, handler, created_at
FROM subgraphs.subgraph_error
ORDER BY vid DESC

select replace(a.node_id, 'index_node_', '') as nodeId,
       count(*) as num_assigned,
       array_agg(d.deployment) as deployments
  from subgraphs.subgraph_deployment_assignment as a,
       subgraphs.subgraph_deployment as d
 where a.id = d.id
 group by node_id
 order by node_id asc;

panels.title: Deployed subgraphs that have not started

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  name,
  head_block_number AS "block_number",
  head_block_hash AS "block_hash"
FROM ethereum_networks
WHERE head_block_number is not  null
ORDER BY name;
